metadata.title: NUML hosts successful Open House & Job Fair â€“ Spring 2025

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 29 (APP):The Faculty of Engineering and Computing at the National University of Modern Languages (NUML) successfully organized its Open House and Job Fair-Spring 2025, offering a dynamic platform for final-year students to showcase their innovative Final Year Projects (FYPs) and engage with leading industry professionals. The event featured an impressive array of projects by students from the departments of Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Mathematics. Exhibits spanned a wide range of cutting-edge domains, including the Internet of Things (IoT), Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Virtual Reality, Mobile Application Development, Web Programming, as well as Pure, Applied, and Computational Mathematics. The innovation, technical depth, and problem-solving approach displayed by the students received widespread acclaim from visiting industry representatives. The Open House not only highlighted the academic excellence of NUML's engineering and computing disciplines but also strengthened industry-academia linkages. The Job Fair component of the event witnessed robust participation from various industry partners. Representatives from leading tech firms conducted on-spot interviews, resulting in multiple job offers and internship opportunities for NUML graduates. The event concluded on a high note, reinforcing NUML's commitment to academic excellence, innovation, and meaningful industry engagement for the professional success of its students.
